title: Perform Hydrostatic Test on Pipeline
description: A new pipeline has been built and must be hydrostatically tested to ensure it is leak-free before being put into service.

tasks.description: Retrieve the hydrostatic test procedure for the pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector finds the procedure, which specifies the required test pressure and duration.

tasks.description: Fill the pipeline with water and use a pump to bring it up to the required test pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew successfully pressurizes the pipeline.

tasks.description: Monitor the pressure for the required duration. If there is no pressure drop, record the test as successful and generate a test certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pressure holds steady, and the inspector logs the passing test and generates the final certificate.
